casebody.data:
In the Matter of Philip HORINSTEIN, Bankrupt, J. Kridel Sons & Company, Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 20, 1927.) No. 784. B.enjamin Siegel, of New York City, for appellant. (Miss) A.' Rosenstein, óf New York City, and Frooks & Prooks, of New York City (Archibald Palmer, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order reversed in open court.
